general_error_details: An error occurred. Please try again later.
too_many_requests_message: Too many requests. Please try again later.
too_many_requests_details: You have exceeded the maximum number of requests allowed. Please try again later.
invalid_package_details: The package.json file is invalid. Please check the file and try again.
invalid_package_suggestion: Please check the package.json file and try again.
route_not_found_details: The route you are trying to access does not exist.
route_not_found_suggestion: Please check the URL and try again.
throttleing_message: Request rate limited: Progressive delays now applied to your requests.
unauthorized: Sorry, you are not authorized to access this resource.
api_key_not_found_details: There is no API key associated with your request.
api_key_not_found_suggestion: Please check the API key and try again
api_key_not_matched_details: The API key provided does not match the one associated with your request.
api_key_not_matched_suggestion: Please check the API key and try again later.
email_not_sent_details: An error occurred while sending the email.
email_not_sent_suggestion: Please check your email configuration and try again later.
file_not_found_details: The file you are trying to access does not exist.
file_not_found_suggestion: Please check the file path and try again.
media_not_found_details: The requested media could not be found.
media_not_found_suggestion: Please check the media ID and try again.
internal_error_details: An unexpected error occurred on the server.
internal_error_suggestion: Please try again later or contact support if the issue persists.
range_not_satisfiable_details: The requested range cannot be satisfied by the server.
range_not_satisfiable_suggestion: Please check the range header and try again.
